text: ennāl mūsāye tanṟe janatayil ninnuḷḷa cila ceṟuppakkārallāte maṟṟāruṁ viśvasiccilla. (at tanne) phir'aunuṁ avariluḷḷa pradhānikaḷuṁ avare marddiccēkkumēā enna bhayappāṭēāṭukūṭiyāyirunnu. tīrccayāyuṁ phir'aun bhūmiyil aunnatyaṁ naṭikkunnavan tanneyākunnu. tīrccayāyuṁ avan atirukaviññavaruṭe kūṭṭattilttanneyākunnu
